lead_paragraph: When hunger drew tens of thousands of Venezuelans to the streets last summer in protest, President Nicolas Maduro turned to the military to manage the country's diminished food supply, putting generals in charge of everything from butter to rice.
snippet: When hunger drew tens of thousands of Venezuelans to the streets last summer in protest, President Nicolas Maduro turned to the military to manage the country's diminished food supply, putting generals in charge of everything from butter to rice....

headline.main: Venezuela Military Trafficking Food as Country Goes Hungry
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Military Trafficking Food as Country Goes Hungry
